chunk:
Moor Spa Plumping Serum (2020 formulation)

Brand: Moor Spa

Category: Anti Aging

Ingredients: Aqua, Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides, Glycerin, Propanediol, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Heilmoor Clay, Cetearyl Glucoside, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Caprylyl Glycol, Natamycin, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate,

Stearoyl Lactylate, Lactic Acid, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Leaf Extract, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5

Directions: Apply sparingly to a cleansed skin. Massage gently over entire face and throat. Follow with a Moisture Cream of choice. For a more intensive treatment: apply a thin layer all over the face, allow it to dry, and then apply a mask of choi

apply a mask of choice over it

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
